library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

			align = "lclcc", 
			format="latex", 
			booktabs=TRUE, 
			escape = FALSE) %>%

	column_spec(2, width = "1.5cm") %>%
	column_spec(3, width = "6.5cm") %>%
	column_spec(4, border_left = TRUE, width = "1.5cm") %>%
	column_spec(5, border_right = TRUE, width = "1.5cm") %>%
